table.name: a
table.select-text:
-- select a.kod_rep_34397_col as kod_rep_34397_col, /*number*//*key*/ a.name as name, /*Наименование колонки*//*string*/ qube.vr_rep_34397_col_raz_nm1 as vr_rep_34397_col_raz_nm, /*Раздел*//*string*/ a.is_new as is_new, /*number*/ a.is_not_new as is_not_new/*number*/
from ( -- select qube.kod_rep_34397_col as kod_rep_34397_col, /*number*//*key*/ /*inner*/( listagg( qube.vr_rep_34397_col_raz_nm1 , '; ' ) within group (order by qube.vr_rep_34397_col_raz_nm1 ) ) as vr_rep_34397_col_raz_nm1/*Раздел*//*string*/
from ( -- select qube.kod_rep_34397_col as kod_rep_34397_col, /*number*//*key*/ qube.vr_rep_34397_col_raz_nm1 as vr_rep_34397_col_raz_nm1/*Номер*//*string*/
from ( ( ( -- select qube.kod_rep_34397_col as kod_rep_34397_col, /*number*//*key*/ qube.vr_rep_34397_col_raz_nm1 as vr_rep_34397_col_raz_nm1/*Номер*//*string*/
from ( -- select un.kod_rep_34397_col as kod_rep_34397_col, /*number*//*key*/ un.vr_rep_34397_col_raz_nm1 as vr_rep_34397_col_raz_nm1/*Номер*//*string*//*key*/
from ( ( ( -- select a.kod_rep_34397_col as kod_rep_34397_col, /*number*//*key*/ null as vr_rep_34397_col_raz_nm1/*string*/
from ( --vr_rep_34397_col select a.kod_rep_34397_col as kod_rep_34397_col/*number*//*key*/
from vr_rep_34397_col a --\vr_rep_34397_col ) a --\vr_rep_34397_col where a.kod_rep_34397_col is not null ) --\ union all ( -- select vr_rep_34397_col_razdel_a_d.kod_rep_34397_col as kod_rep_34397_col, /*number*//*key*/ vr_rep_34397_col_razdel_a_d.name as vr_rep_34397_col_raz_nm1/*Номер*//*string*/
from ( --vr_rep_34397_col_razdel select a.kod_rep_34397_col as kod_rep_34397_col, /*number*/ kod_razdel.abbr || ( case when ( nvl( a.with_childs ,0)=1 ) then '*' end ) as name/*Номер*//*string*/
from vr_rep_34397_col_razdel a --\vr_rep_34397_col_razdel left outer join ( --ips_razdel_ip select a.kod_razdel as kod_razdel, /*number*//*key*/ a.abbr as abbr/*Номер*//*string*/
from ips_razdel_ip a --\ips_razdel_ip ) kod_razdel on a.kod_razdel = kod_razdel.kod_razdel--\ips_razdel_ip ) vr_rep_34397_col_razdel_a_d --\vr_rep_34397_col_razdel left outer join ( --vr_rep_34397_col select a.kod_rep_34397_col as kod_rep_34397_col/*number*//*key*/
from vr_rep_34397_col a --\vr_rep_34397_col ) a on vr_rep_34397_col_razdel_a_d.kod_rep_34397_col = a.kod_rep_34397_col--\vr_rep_34397_col where a.kod_rep_34397_col is not null ) --\ ) --\ ) un --\ group by un.kod_rep_34397_col, /*number*//*key*/ un.vr_rep_34397_col_raz_nm1/*Номер*//*string*//*key*/ ) qube --\ ) --\ ) --\ ) qube --\ ) qube --\ group by qube.kod_rep_34397_col/*number*//*key*/ ) qube --\ left outer join ( --vr_rep_34397_col select a.kod_rep_34397_col as kod_rep_34397_col, /*number*//*key*/ a.name as name, /*Наименование колонки*//*string*/ 0 as is_new, /*number*/ 1 as is_not_new/*number*/
from vr_rep_34397_col a --\vr_rep_34397_col ) a on a.kod_rep_34397_col = qube.kod_rep_34397_col--\vr_rep_34397_col --\

select.query:
-- select qube.vr_rep_34397_col_raz_nm1 as vr_rep_34397_col_raz_nm, /*Раздел*//*string*/ a.kod_rep_34397_col as kod_rep_34397_col/*number*//*key*/
from ( -- select qube.kod_rep_34397_col as kod_rep_34397_col, /*number*//*key*/ /*inner*/( listagg( qube.vr_rep_34397_col_raz_nm1 , '; ' ) within group (order by qube.vr_rep_34397_col_raz_nm1 ) ) as vr_rep_34397_col_raz_nm1/*Раздел*//*string*/
from ( -- select qube.kod_rep_34397_col as kod_rep_34397_col, /*number*//*key*/ qube.vr_rep_34397_col_raz_nm1 as vr_rep_34397_col_raz_nm1/*Номер*//*string*/
from ( ( ( -- select qube.kod_rep_34397_col as kod_rep_34397_col, /*number*//*key*/ qube.vr_rep_34397_col_raz_nm1 as vr_rep_34397_col_raz_nm1/*Номер*//*string*/
from ( -- select un.kod_rep_34397_col as kod_rep_34397_col, /*number*//*key*/ un.vr_rep_34397_col_raz_nm1 as vr_rep_34397_col_raz_nm1/*Номер*//*string*//*key*/
from ( ( ( -- select a.kod_rep_34397_col as kod_rep_34397_col, /*number*//*key*/ null as vr_rep_34397_col_raz_nm1/*string*/
from ( --vr_rep_34397_col select a.kod_rep_34397_col as kod_rep_34397_col/*number*//*key*/
from (select a.kod_rep_34397_col as kod_rep_34397_col from vr_rep_34397_col a where not exists (select * from rr_temp t where t.skod ='a' and t.names=:form_id and a.kod_rep_34397_col=t.f2 ) and a.kod_rep_34397_col in :kod_rep_34397_col_prm union all select t.n1 as kod_rep_34397_col from rr_temp t where t.skod ='a' and t.names=:form_id and t.f3!=3 and t.f2 in :kod_rep_34397_col_prm ) a --\(select a.kod_rep_34397_col as kod_rep_34397_col from vr_rep_34397_col a where not exists (select * from rr_temp t where t.skod ='a' and t.names=:form_id and a.kod_rep_34397_col=t.f2 ) and a.kod_rep_34397_col in :kod_rep_34397_col_prm union all select t.n1 as kod_rep_34397_col from rr_temp t where t.skod ='a' and t.names=:form_id and t.f3!=3 and t.f2 in :kod_rep_34397_col_prm ) ) a --\vr_rep_34397_col where a.kod_rep_34397_col is not null ) --\ union all ( -- select vr_rep_34397_col_razdel_a_d.kod_rep_34397_col as kod_rep_34397_col, /*number*//*key*/ vr_rep_34397_col_razdel_a_d.name as vr_rep_34397_col_raz_nm1/*Номер*//*string*/
from ( --vr_rep_34397_col_razdel select a.kod_rep_34397_col as kod_rep_34397_col, /*number*/ kod_razdel.abbr || ( case when ( nvl( a.with_childs ,0)=1 ) then '*' end ) as name/*Номер*//*string*/
from vr_rep_34397_col_razdel a --\vr_rep_34397_col_razdel left outer join ( --ips_razdel_ip select a.kod_razdel as kod_razdel, /*number*//*key*/ a.abbr as abbr/*Номер*//*string*/
from ips_razdel_ip a --\ips_razdel_ip ) kod_razdel on a.kod_razdel = kod_razdel.kod_razdel--\ips_razdel_ip ) vr_rep_34397_col_razdel_a_d --\vr_rep_34397_col_razdel left outer join ( --vr_rep_34397_col select a.kod_rep_34397_col as kod_rep_34397_col/*number*//*key*/
from (select a.kod_rep_34397_col as kod_rep_34397_col from vr_rep_34397_col a where not exists (select * from rr_temp t where t.skod ='a' and t.names=:form_id and a.kod_rep_34397_col=t.f2 ) and a.kod_rep_34397_col in :kod_rep_34397_col_prm union all select t.n1 as kod_rep_34397_col from rr_temp t where t.skod ='a' and t.names=:form_id and t.f3!=3 and t.f2 in :kod_rep_34397_col_prm ) a --\(select a.kod_rep_34397_col as kod_rep_34397_col from vr_rep_34397_col a where not exists (select * from rr_temp t where t.skod ='a' and t.names=:form_id and a.kod_rep_34397_col=t.f2 ) and a.kod_rep_34397_col in :kod_rep_34397_col_prm union all select t.n1 as kod_rep_34397_col from rr_temp t where t.skod ='a' and t.names=:form_id and t.f3!=3 and t.f2 in :kod_rep_34397_col_prm ) ) a on vr_rep_34397_col_razdel_a_d.kod_rep_34397_col = a.kod_rep_34397_col--\vr_rep_34397_col where a.kod_rep_34397_col is not null ) --\ ) --\ ) un --\ group by un.kod_rep_34397_col, /*number*//*key*/ un.vr_rep_34397_col_raz_nm1/*Номер*//*string*//*key*/ ) qube --\ ) --\ ) --\ ) qube --\ ) qube --\ group by qube.kod_rep_34397_col/*number*//*key*/ ) qube --\ left outer join ( --vr_rep_34397_col select a.kod_rep_34397_col as kod_rep_34397_col/*number*//*key*/
from (select a.kod_rep_34397_col as kod_rep_34397_col from vr_rep_34397_col a where not exists (select * from rr_temp t where t.skod ='a' and t.names=:form_id and a.kod_rep_34397_col=t.f2 ) and a.kod_rep_34397_col in :kod_rep_34397_col_prm union all select t.n1 as kod_rep_34397_col from rr_temp t where t.skod ='a' and t.names=:form_id and t.f3!=3 and t.f2 in :kod_rep_34397_col_prm ) a --\(select a.kod_rep_34397_col as kod_rep_34397_col from vr_rep_34397_col a where not exists (select * from rr_temp t where t.skod ='a' and t.names=:form_id and a.kod_rep_34397_col=t.f2 ) and a.kod_rep_34397_col in :kod_rep_34397_col_prm union all select t.n1 as kod_rep_34397_col from rr_temp t where t.skod ='a' and t.names=:form_id and t.f3!=3 and t.f2 in :kod_rep_34397_col_prm ) ) a on a.kod_rep_34397_col = qube.kod_rep_34397_col--\vr_rep_34397_col --\

table.clear-temp-text: delete from rr_temp where skod='a' and names=:form_id

select.query:
-- select a.kod_rep_34397_col as kod_rep_34397_col, /*number*//*key*/ a.name as name, /*Наименование колонки*//*string*/ qube.vr_rep_34397_col_raz_nm1 as vr_rep_34397_col_raz_nm, /*Раздел*//*string*/ a.is_new as is_new, /*number*/ a.is_not_new as is_not_new/*number*/

from ( --vr_rep_34397_col select a.kod_rep_34397_col as kod_rep_34397_col/*number*//*key*/
from (select a.kod_rep_34397_col as kod_rep_34397_col from vr_rep_34397_col a where not exists (select * from rr_temp t where t.skod ='a' and t.names=:form_id and a.kod_rep_34397_col=t.f2 ) and a.kod_rep_34397_col in :kod_rep_34397_col_prm union all select t.n1 as kod_rep_34397_col from rr_temp t where t.skod ='a' and t.names=:form_id and t.f3!=3 and t.f2 in :kod_rep_34397_col_prm ) a --\(select a.kod_rep_34397_col as kod_rep_34397_col from vr_rep_34397_col a where not exists (select * from rr_temp t where t.skod ='a' and t.names=:form_id and a.kod_rep_34397_col=t.f2 ) and a.kod_rep_34397_col in :kod_rep_34397_col_prm union all select t.n1 as kod_rep_34397_col from rr_temp t where t.skod ='a' and t.names=:form_id and t.f3!=3 and t.f2 in :kod_rep_34397_col_prm ) ) a --\vr_rep_34397_col where a.kod_rep_34397_col is not null ) --\ union all ( -- select vr_rep_34397_col_razdel_a_d.kod_rep_34397_col as kod_rep_34397_col, /*number*//*key*/ vr_rep_34397_col_razdel_a_d.name as vr_rep_34397_col_raz_nm1/*Номер*//*string*/
from ( --vr_rep_34397_col_razdel select a.kod_rep_34397_col as kod_rep_34397_col, /*number*/ kod_razdel.abbr || ( case when ( nvl( a.with_childs ,0)=1 ) then '*' end ) as name/*Номер*//*string*/
from vr_rep_34397_col_razdel a --\vr_rep_34397_col_razdel left outer join ( --ips_razdel_ip select a.kod_razdel as kod_razdel, /*number*//*key*/ a.abbr as abbr/*Номер*//*string*/
from ips_razdel_ip a --\ips_razdel_ip ) kod_razdel on a.kod_razdel = kod_razdel.kod_razdel--\ips_razdel_ip ) vr_rep_34397_col_razdel_a_d --\vr_rep_34397_col_razdel left outer join ( --vr_rep_34397_col select a.kod_rep_34397_col as kod_rep_34397_col/*number*//*key*/
from (select a.kod_rep_34397_col as kod_rep_34397_col from vr_rep_34397_col a where not exists (select * from rr_temp t where t.skod ='a' and t.names=:form_id and a.kod_rep_34397_col=t.f2 ) and a.kod_rep_34397_col in :kod_rep_34397_col_prm union all select t.n1 as kod_rep_34397_col from rr_temp t where t.skod ='a' and t.names=:form_id and t.f3!=3 and t.f2 in :kod_rep_34397_col_prm ) a --\(select a.kod_rep_34397_col as kod_rep_34397_col from vr_rep_34397_col a where not exists (select * from rr_temp t where t.skod ='a' and t.names=:form_id and a.kod_rep_34397_col=t.f2 ) and a.kod_rep_34397_col in :kod_rep_34397_col_prm union all select t.n1 as kod_rep_34397_col from rr_temp t where t.skod ='a' and t.names=:form_id and t.f3!=3 and t.f2 in :kod_rep_34397_col_prm ) ) a on vr_rep_34397_col_razdel_a_d.kod_rep_34397_col = a.kod_rep_34397_col--\vr_rep_34397_col where a.kod_rep_34397_col is not null ) --\ ) --\ ) un --\ group by un.kod_rep_34397_col, /*number*//*key*/ un.vr_rep_34397_col_raz_nm1/*Номер*//*string*//*key*/ ) qube --\ ) --\ ) --\ ) qube --\ ) qube --\ group by qube.kod_rep_34397_col/*number*//*key*/ ) qube --\ left outer join ( --vr_rep_34397_col select a.kod_rep_34397_col as kod_rep_34397_col, /*number*//*key*/ a.name as name, /*Наименование колонки*//*string*/ a.is_new as is_new, /*number*/ a.is_not_new as is_not_new/*number*/
from (select a.kod_rep_34397_col as kod_rep_34397_col,a.name as name,0 as is_new,1 as is_not_new from vr_rep_34397_col a where not exists (select * from rr_temp t where t.skod ='a' and t.names=:form_id and a.kod_rep_34397_col=t.f2 ) and a.kod_rep_34397_col in :kod_rep_34397_col_prm union all select t.n1 as kod_rep_34397_col,t.s1 as name,decode (f3,1,1,0) as is_new,decode (f3,1,0,1) as is_not_new from rr_temp t where t.skod ='a' and t.names=:form_id and t.f3!=3 and t.f2 in :kod_rep_34397_col_prm ) a --\(select a.kod_rep_34397_col as kod_rep_34397_col,a.name as name,0 as is_new,1 as is_not_new from vr_rep_34397_col a where not exists (select * from rr_temp t where t.skod ='a' and t.names=:form_id and a.kod_rep_34397_col=t.f2 ) and a.kod_rep_34397_col in :kod_rep_34397_col_prm union all select t.n1 as kod_rep_34397_col,t.s1 as name,decode (f3,1,1,0) as is_new,decode (f3,1,0,1) as is_not_new from rr_temp t where t.skod ='a' and t.names=:form_id and t.f3!=3 and t.f2 in :kod_rep_34397_col_prm ) ) a on a.kod_rep_34397_col = qube.kod_rep_34397_col--\vr_rep_34397_col --\
